article.name: Whitelist for Harmony Email & Collaboration in Microsoft 365 and Google Workspace
article.title: Whitelist for Harmony Email & Collaboration in Microsoft 365 and Google Workspace
article.body:
If your organization uses Harmony Email & Collaboration (formerly Avanan), you don’t need to configure any additional whitelisting since it automatically detects phishing simulation tools. For more information, see the Harmony Email & Collaboration Administration Guide.

If you experience issues whitelisting KnowBe4 for Harmony Email & Collaboration, we recommend directly reaching out to them for assistance. You can also contact our support team and we'll be happy to assist you.

Important:Some whitelisting configurations may not be available in environments outside of the US.
